keyword: how many calories are in 1 tablespoon of peanut butter
title: How Many Calories in 1 Tablespoon Peanut Butter?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in 1 tablespoon of peanut butter, including protein, fats, carbs, and nutrition tweaks for better choices.
h1: How Many Calories in 1 Tablespoon Peanut Butter?
assumptions: Smooth, natural peanut butter; 1 tbsp â‰ˆ16 g; no added sugar, salt, or oils.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, ingredients (e.g., added sugar/salt), and texture; check labels for accuracy.

quick_answer.text: One tablespoon of peanut butter provides ~94 kcal and ~4 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories are in 1 tablespoon of peanut butter?
faqs.a: Approximately 94 kcal for natural peanut butter.

faqs.q: How much protein is in a tablespoon of peanut butter?
faqs.a: About 4 g of protein per tablespoon.

faqs.q: Does peanut butter have a lot of fat?
faqs.a: Yes, around 8 g total fat per tablespoon, mostly healthy unsaturated fats.

faqs.q: What's the difference in calories between natural and regular peanut butter?
faqs.a: Natural has ~94 kcal; regular with added sugar/salt can be 100-110 kcal per tablespoon.

faqs.q: Is there fiber in peanut butter?
faqs.a: Yes, about 1.3 g of dietary fiber per tablespoon.
